greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest multiple of n with digit sum = 7, or 0 if no such number exists, e.g. a(3k)= a(11k) = 0.
comment: Either no multiples of 37k have digit sum 7 or their first values are > 10000000. - Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jul 02 2002
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 01 2002
